title: Jewel Tool (2 Pack) 12" Heavy Duty Blunt Point Tweezers | Stainless Steel Construction | Textured Handle Grip | Great For Handling Delicate Objects

TEXTURED HANDLES: The tweezers feature a textured handle that provides a secure and comfortable grip, even when working with slippery or difficult-to-handle items. This added grip reduces hand fatigue and helps maintain control during use.

VALUE PACK: This set comes with two tweezers, so you can keep one as a backup or use them simultaneously for more efficient work. These tweezers are perfect for various tasks, including jewelry-making, electronics repair, and more.

VERSATILE: The blunt point tip and extra-long design make these tweezers ideal for a wide range of tasks, from picking up small objects to handling larger items. They are perfect for hobbies, crafts, and professional applications alike. The Jewel Tool 12" Heavy Duty Blunt Point Tweezers with Textured Handle are a must-have for anyone who works with small objects on a regular basis.
